solution_line_template: She rode for {years_ridden} years x {days_per_year} days = <<{years_ridden}*{days_per_year}={total_days_ridden}>>{total_days_ridden} days.
She rode a total of {miles_per_day} miles x {total_days_ridden} days = <<{miles_per_day}*{total_days_ridden}={total_miles_ridden}>>{total_miles_ridden} miles.
